biotools.summary: It implements a novel viral assembling and frequency estimation methods. This software uses a simple error correction, viral variants assembling based on maximum-bandwidth paths in weighted read graphs and frequency estimation via Expectation Maximization on all reads.

bioschemas.name: ViSpA
bioschemas.summary: It implements a novel viral assembling and frequency estimation methods. This software uses a simple error correction, viral variants assembling based on maximum-bandwidth paths in weighted read graphs and frequency estimation via Expectation Maximization on all reads.
